price: ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߘߍ߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߞߍ ߞߊ߲߬ ߟߊߒߠߦߊߓߊ߮ ߟߎ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߢߊ߯ ߏ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَهُمۡ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفۡعَلُونَ بِٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ شُهُودٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wahum ʿalā mā yafʿalūna bil-mu'minīna shuhūdun
